title: Can we talk about Xerath?
body:
Still unpopular, according to LoLking right now tenth least popular champ in the game. 

Overall it's like he has two abilities, arcanopulse and not arcanopulse. He's supposed to be like an AP siege tank, that was always the fantasy but it hardly seems to deliver now. 

Don't get me wrong, old Xerath was hidden freelo mega cancer(oh man good times) but new Xerath isn't much better, aside from overall feeling worse to play.
